summary: A 15-year-old Long Island boy loses everything and everyone he knows, soon becoming involved in a relationship with a much older man.
cast: Paul Dano|Bruce Altman|Billy Kay|James Costa|Tony Michael Donnelly|Michelle Carano|Tatiana Burgos|Brian Cox|B. Constance Barry|Walter Masterson|Brad Silnutzer|Bob Gerardi|Adam LeFevre|Frank Rivers|Anthony F. Peragine|Jude LoBasso|Marcia DeBonis|Gladys Dano|Emilio Cuesta|Christine Toy Johnson|Francis Leik|Chuck Ardezzone|Risa Ziegler|Ray Garvey|Angela Pietropinto|Chance Kelly|Luis G. Moreno
title: L.I.E.
